GET /api.description: Serves up a JSON representation of all the available endpoints of the api.

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics.

GET /api/comments.description: Serves an array of objects containing all comments.

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles.

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an article object from the id requested.

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of comment objects from the article id in the request

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

GET /api/users.descripton: Serves an array of objects with all the registered users in the database

GET /api/users/:username.description: Serves a user object from the name requested.

PATCH /api/comments/comment_id.description: Serves a comment object with votes which are either increased or decreased by the given value.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an article object with votes which are either increased or decreased by the given value.

POST /api/articles/.description: Posts a new article and assigns a new ID

POST /api/topics/.description: Posts a new topic and assigns a new ID

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves a new comment object from the article id in the request.

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id.description: Deletes the article with the ID supplied in the request

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the comment from the ID supplied in the request
